update bus_product

detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

sales_count = #{salesCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
